constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 129 (Tuesday, August 2, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. BASS:
H.R. 8637.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 1 of the United States Constitution,
providing--``All legislative Powers herein granted shall be
vested in a Congress of the United States, which shall
consist of a Senate and House of Representatives.''
[Page H7545]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

title: Law Enforcement De-Escalation Training Act of 2022
